columns.title: Columns
columns.description: Columns to check for 1 unique value

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Threshold by with column is droped.

upper_threshold.title: Upper Threshold
upper_threshold.description: Columns with 2 values and            a population more than upper_threshold are transformed to [0,1]

num_values.title: Number of Values
num_values.description: Number of values that should be             tested to set to '1' excluding 'None/nan' values

equal_only.title: Only equal
equal_only.description: Only number of unique values that match             that match 'Number of Values' should be transformed.
